key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to heightened scrutiny and potential fines
Interest rate sensitivity impacting loan demand and net interest margins
Economic and market risks tied to regional economic conditions
Competitive pressures from traditional and non-traditional financial service providers
Customer complaints affecting reputation and trust
controversies: Significant regulatory fines and increased compliance obligations
Customer complaints filed with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB)
social_issues: Customer service and operational challenges highlighted by recent complaints
governance_issues: Regulatory oversight and compliance burdens imposed by federal and state regulators
